channel.title: Gill Thorpe
channel.description: Gill Thorpe Textile design and Visual Communication

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description: test image Project info Seinfeld ipsum dolor sit amet George: I would drape myself in velvet if it were socially acceptable. Puddy: I painted my face Elaine: You painted your face? Puddy: Yeah. Elaine: Why? Puddy: Well, you know, support the team. Elaine: It’s very hard being a stand-up comedian. Sometimes they don’t laugh. Jerry: Sometimes the road less traveled is less traveled for a reason. Jerry: When someone is lying, is it true that their pants are actually on fire? Jerry: Vandelay Industries, Kel Varnsen speaking. May we help you? Jackie Chiles: Rugged? The man’s a goblin.
